publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2150 Mr Stewart Maxwell: World Health Organisation Tobacco Treaty—That the Parliament congratulates Peru on being the 40th country to ratify the World Health Organisation’s Framework Convention on Tobacco Control, which means that this tobacco treaty will come into force on 28 February 2005; recognises that the United Kingdom will ratify this treaty on 16 December 2004 and will be bound by the new law and, in particular, Article 8 of that treaty which deals with protection from exposure to tobacco smoke, including in workplaces, and therefore calls on the UK Government to honour its obligation by banning smoking in all workplaces.

S2M-2150 World Health Organisation Tobacco Treaty (lodged on 13 December 2004) Michael Matheson*, Eleanor Scott*, Christine Grahame*, Mike Pringle*, Alex Neil*, Patrick Harvie*, Brian Adam*, Stewart Stevenson*, Shiona Baird*
S2M-2150 World Health Organisation Tobacco Treaty (lodged on 13 December 2004) Chris Ballance*, Rob Gibson*, Robin Harper*
S2M-2150 World Health Organisation Tobacco Treaty (lodged on 13 December 2004) Trish Godman*
